bkg16_Music

Class SongManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bkg16_Music.SongManager

  • public class SongManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class SongManager is responsible for creating, updating and deleting Song records.
    Author:
    bengundy

    • Method Detail

      • createSong

        public void createSong(java.lang.String title,
                       int length,
                       java.lang.String filePath,
                       java.lang.String releaseDate,
                       java.lang.String recordDate,
                       java.util.Set<Album> songAlbums,
                       java.util.Set<Artist> songArtists,
                       java.util.Set<Genre> songGenres)
        Method createSong generates a new Song record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        title - is the song's title.
        length - is the length of the song in minutes.
        filePath - is the location of the corresponding song file.
        releaseDate - is the date the song was released.
        recordDate - is the date the song was recorded.
        songAlbums - is the albums associated with the song.
        songArtists - is the artists associated with the song.
        songGenres - is the genres associated with the song.

      • updateSong

        public void updateSong(java.lang.String songID,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       int length,
                       java.lang.String filePath,
                       java.lang.String releaseDate,
                       java.lang.String recordDate,
                       java.util.Set<Album> songAlbums,
                       java.util.Set<Artist> songArtists,
                       java.util.Set<Genre> songGenres)
        Method updateSong updates a Song record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        songID - is the identifying UUID of the target Song.
        title - is the song's title.
        length - is the length of the song in minutes.
        filePath - is the location of the corresponding song file.
        releaseDate - is the date the song was released.
        recordDate - is the date the song was recorded.
        songAlbums - is the albums associated with the song.
        songArtists - is the artists associated with the song.
        songGenres - is the genres associated with the song.

        Method deleteSong removes a Song record from the ORM object grid.

        songID - is the identifying UUID of the target Song.

        Returns:
        is the Song object.

      • getSongList

        public org.json.JSONArray getSongList(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                      java.lang.String searchType)
        Method getSongList returns a set of songs that fit the incoming search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - is the string target of the search.
        searchType - is the portion of the song title that must match the searchTerm.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of songs that fit the incoming search criteria.

      • getSongListByAlbumID

        public org.json.JSONArray getSongListByAlbumID(java.lang.String albumID)
        Method getSongListByAlbumID returns a set of songs that are linked to the incoming albumID.
        Parameters:
        albumID - is the ID of the album to be used in the search.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of songs that are linked to the albumID.
